DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study describe demographic socioeconomics characteristic associated diagnosis metastatic breast cancer Brazil .
DOC.brief_title: Metastatic Breast Cancer Brazil : Characterization Patients Treatments
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim study characterize patient treatment metastatic breast cancer Brazil . Other specific aim : - describe patient demographic socioeconomic characteristic - describe BC pathological characterization - describe treatment ( describe treatment date start-end , cycle , dose , sequence line treatment , reason discontinuation ) - analyze patient outcome ( time progression , site metastasis , progression free survival ( PFS ) , overall survival ( OS ) , skeletal related event ( SRE ) )
DOC.criteria: Women > 18 year old Patients diagnose de novo recurrent metastatic breast cancer period January December 2012 Any invasive breast cancer histology subtype Male breast cancer
